snippet: Mr. Trump dispenses with the ominous thing in his new ads, addressing the camera directly the way a more conventional candidate might.
abstract: Latest ads released by Donald Trump in Pennsylvania and Indiana feature upbeat, straightforward message from presidential candidate who has often shirked conventionality; other advertisements in presidential race examined.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump dispenses with the ominous thing in his new ads, addressing the camera directly the way a more conventional candidate might.

headline.print_headline: From Trump, a Nod to the Conventional
